snippet: Residents of the small Pacific Ocean community voted overwhelmingly against for the construction of up to 34 oil wells in the center of town
abstract: Residents of Hermosa Beach, Calif, vote overwhelmingly against construction of up to 34 oil wells on municipal parking lot in center of town by E&B Natural Resources Management.
lead_paragraph: Residents of the small Pacific Ocean community voted overwhelmingly against for the construction of up to 34 oil wells in the center of town

headline.main: Hermosa Beach, Calif., Voters Give Thumbs Down to Oil Drilling
